short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily compare against the previous period or year of any date range in Google Search Console, just like you can in Analytics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A lightweight Chrome extension that enhances the performance report within Google Search Console. This extension is just 7KB, and is active only when you’re using Google Search Console. It doesn’t collect any data. 

Updated 14/02/2024 to adapt to design changes by Google.
https://twitter.com/googlesearchc/status/1758033436822892551

Update 06/10/2024 to adapt to further design changes by Google.
https://x.com/googlesearchc/status/1840752281442017506
